item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Panic! At The Disco - High Hopes
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G.
As performed by Panic! at the Disco.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Carpenter Brut - Turbo Killer
item.description:
Performed & written by Carpenter Brut
Something for those who fancy a challenge. Also, not many synthwave play-alongs around.

item.title: Twenty One Pilots - House Of Gold
item.description:
Ukulele play along
House Of Gold - Twenty One Pilots
Using the chords: C F G A7 Am Dm Bbm ** A good chance to practice the B flat minor chord! **
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or D DU DU DU - it is fast
Notes: Tyler Joseph plays a C chord for the first section (chorus). I have used the chords as a guide to help singing but you can play a C chord if you prefer.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Alessia Cara - How Far I'll Go
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
As performed by Alessia Cara
The audio has been adjusted to move from the original Key of E to F, and then to remove the key change at the end. Note the barre chords: Bbm, Bb, F, and Fmaj7 (These last two occur at the end)
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The

item.title: Burn The Ballroom - Crazy
item.description:
For educational purposes--all rights remain with the group.
"Crazy" by Burn the Ballroom. In the Key of F (F, A, Dm, Bb, Bbm, C, C7). I heard this song as bumper music on the Tony Kornheiser Show--and it stick in my head as a great song for a ukulele play along. The lyrics may not be appropriate for young students. The melody is wonderful!
This song was fun to work out, as the chords were not readily available on various "tab" websites.
The group's albums and this song can be found on iTunes and Amazon. You can also access the group's YouTube recording: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WrSlr2LxdDk
The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
